banner_text: NOTICE: Systems maintenance scheduled for Dec 30, 2024. Licensure lookup may be intermittent.

entities_affected.public_impact: Parents believed provider was licensed during raid aftermath

timeline_events.details: Internal DHS memo circulates. No public update.
Raids reported in media, but Lookup tool shows 'Active'.
System goes 'down' exactly when massive status updates occur.
